abstract: Firefox can be customized in several ways, so checking program settings will ensure that the browser is uniform, whether you’re using a Mac or a PC.
snippet: Firefox can be customized in several ways, so checking program settings will ensure that the browser is uniform, whether you’re using a Mac or a PC.
lead_paragraph: Q. When I use the Firefox browser on a Mac, I can see the File, Edit, History, Bookmarks and other menus at the top of the screen, but when I use the same browser on a Windows PC, those menus are not at the top of the window. Is there some secret to making them visible?

headline.main: Adding Menus and Buttons to Firefox
